vast.ai.global_gpu_market_leader: Vast.ai is the market leader in low-cost cloud GPU rental.
vast.ai.docker_ecosystem: Docker-based container and image deployment to get all the software needed up and running quickly.
vast.ai.powerful_search_console: Provides a powerful search console to find the GPUs needed.
vast.ai.on_demand_or_interruptible: Offers the choice between on-demand rentals for convenience and consistent pricing, or saving further with interruptible instances using spot auction based pricing.
vast.ai.security_level_options: Offers an array of providers that offer different levels of security, allowing users to find the best pricing for the level of security and reliability needed.
vast.ai.gui_and_cli: Provides a command line interface to search the entire marketplace for offers while utilizing scriptable filters and sort options. Allows for launching instances quickly right from the CLI and easily automating deployment.
vast.ai.real_time_bidding_system: Enables saving an additional 50% or more by using interruptible instances and auction pricing. The highest bidding instances run, while other conflicting instances are stopped.
vast.ai.call_to_action: Users can reach out for assistance by using the Crisp chat in the lower right, joining the Discord server, or emailing support@vast.ai.
vast.ai.dlperf_real_time_automatic_benchmarking: Offers DLPerf (Deep Learning Performance) for real-time automatic benchmarking to help automate and standardize the evaluation and ranking of hardware platforms.
vast.ai.transparent_pricing_interface: Provides a single interface for transparent pricing, allowing fair comparison from all kinds of providers and avoiding vendor lock-in.
vast.ai.decentralized_compute: Taps into the vast power of decentralized compute, allowing anyone to become a cloud compute provider and resulting in much lower prices.
vast.ai.choose_security_level: Gives users control over the level of security required for tasks, from lower-cost hobbyist providers with consumer GPUs up to Tier 4 data centers with enterprise GPUs.
vast.ai.democratizing_ai: Works towards democratizing AI by ensuring that the compute powering AI is supplied by the people and for the people.
